amendment.description: To require a report on the permanent stationing of the United States forces in the Republic of Poland.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2276 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2276 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Boozman to Amendment SA 2282. (consideration: CR S3934, S3939-3940, S3943; text as modified: CR S3934-3935) To require a report on the permanent stationing of the United States forces in the Republic of Poland.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2276 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Boozman to Amendment SA 2282.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2276 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
